title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Drolshagen, Germany
content:
Photo submitted by Benedikt Smit, “An ‘after-work-ride’ in Drolshagen, Germany at -10°C just before it got dark.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please note that public […]

author: Kristi Benedict
